titles: A proclamation, for putting the kingdom of Scotland in a posture of defence against the enemies of the King and government
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Haly-rude-house, the 28. day of April 1685. And of Our Reign the first year.
Signed: Will. Paterson, Cls. Sti. Concilij.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Scotland. --  Army --  Mobilization --  Early works to 1800.
